name: Uphill Skiing
description: Experience the authentic Finnish school journey in this virtual reality skiing game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
